name: Brother Aldric
long_description: Brother Aldric is a devoted healer who serves in the Temple of Healing. His gentle demeanor and compassionate eyes reflect years of tending to the wounded and sick. He wears simple white robes adorned with symbols of healing, and carries the faint scent of medicinal herbs. His hands, though aged, move with practiced precision.

dialogue.greeting: Blessings upon you, child. Are you in need of healing?
dialogue.default: The temple offers healing to all who seek it. My services are available for a modest donation.
dialogue.goodbye: May the light guide your path. Return if you need healing.

minor_heal.name: Minor Healing
minor_heal.description: Restores a small amount of health

moderate_heal.name: Moderate Healing
moderate_heal.description: Restores a moderate amount of health

major_heal.name: Major Healing
major_heal.description: Restores a large amount of health
